targets.expr:
max by(pod, workload_type, workload, uid, node) (
  last_over_time(container_last_seen_time{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod", uid=~"$pod_uid"}[$__range])
) * 1000 * on(pod, uid) group_left(workload_type, workload)
max by(pod, workload_type, workload, uid) (
  last_over_time(namespace_workload_pod:kube_pod_owner:relabel{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod", uid!="", workload_type!="static-pod"}[$__range])
)
# using a single query with "OR" here because otherwise grafana would show 2 separate "Last seen" columns
or
max by(pod, workload_type, workload, uid, node) (
  last_over_time(container_last_seen_time{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod"}[$__range])
) * 1000 * on(pod) group_left(workload_type, workload)
# omitting uid here because for static pods cadvisor uid does not match kube-state-metrics uid
max by(pod, workload_type, workload) (
  last_over_time(namespace_workload_pod:kube_pod_owner:relabel{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod", uid!="", workload_type="static-pod"}[$__range])
)

min by(pod) (
    (kube_pod_status_phase{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod", uid=~"$pod_uid", phase="Failed"} == 1) * 2
    or
    (kube_pod_status_phase{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod", uid=~"$pod_uid", phase="Pending"} == 1) * 3
    or
    (
        kube_pod_status_phase{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod", uid=~"$pod_uid", phase="Running"} == 1
        and on(cluster_type, cluster, namespace, pod)
        min_over_time(kube_pod_status_ready{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod", uid=~"$pod_uid", condition="true"}[$__interval]) == 1
    ) * 4
    or
    (
        kube_pod_status_phase{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod", uid=~"$pod_uid", phase="Running"} == 1
        and on(cluster_type, cluster, namespace, pod)
        min_over_time(kube_pod_status_ready{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod", uid=~"$pod_uid", condition="true"}[$__interval]) == 0
    ) * 5
    or
    (kube_pod_status_phase{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod", uid=~"$pod_uid", phase="Succeeded"} == 1) * 6
    or
    (kube_pod_status_phase{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod", uid=~"$pod_uid", phase="Unknown"} == 1) * 7
)
sum by (pod) (max_over_time(kube_pod_container_status_restarts_total{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod", uid=~"$pod_uid"}[$__rate_interval]))
sum by(pod) (rate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod", uid=~"$pod_uid"}[$__rate_interval]))
sum (rate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod", uid=~"$pod_uid", invalid=$total}[$__rate_interval]))
scalar(max(kube_resourcequota{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod", uid=~"$pod_uid", type="hard", resource="requests.cpu"}))
scalar(max(kube_resourcequota{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod", uid=~"$pod_uid", type="hard", resource="limits.cpu"}))

sum by(pod) (
  max by(pod, container) (rate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod", uid=~"$pod_uid"}[$__rate_interval]))
  /
  max by(pod, container) (kube_pod_container_resource_requests{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod", uid=~"$pod_uid", resource="cpu"})
)
scalar(max(kube_resourcequota{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod", uid=~"$pod_uid", type="hard", resource="requests.memory"}))

# max by(pod, container) should fix overlapping data on container restarts
sum by (pod) (max by(pod, container) (max_over_time(kube_pod_container_resource_requests{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod", uid=~"$pod_uid", resource="memory"}[$__interval])))
sum (max by(pod, container) (max_over_time(kube_pod_container_resource_requests{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod", uid=~"$pod_uid", resource="memory"}[$__interval])))
scalar(max(kube_resourcequota{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod", uid=~"$pod_uid", type="hard", resource="limits.memory"}))

# max by(pod, container) should fix overlapping data on container restarts
sum by (pod) (max by(pod, container) (max_over_time(kube_pod_container_resource_limits{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod", uid=~"$pod_uid", resource="memory"}[$__interval])))
sum (max by(pod, container) (max_over_time(kube_pod_container_resource_limits{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod", uid=~"$pod_uid", resource="memory"}[$__interval])))

# max by(pod, container) should fix overlapping data on container restarts
sum by (pod) (max by(pod, container) (max_over_time(container_memory_rss{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod", uid=~"$pod_uid"}[$__rate_interval])))
sum (max by(pod, container) (max_over_time(container_memory_rss{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod", uid=~"$pod_uid", invalid=$total}[$__rate_interval])))

# max by(pod, container) should fix overlapping data on container restarts
sum by (pod) (max by(pod, container) (max_over_time(container_memory_working_set_bytes{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod", uid=~"$pod_uid"}[$__rate_interval])))
sum (max by(pod, container) (max_over_time(container_memory_working_set_bytes{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod", uid=~"$pod_uid", invalid=$total}[$__rate_interval])))

# max by(pod, container) should fix overlapping data on container restarts
sum by (pod) (max by(pod, container) (max_over_time(container_memory_rss{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod", uid=~"$pod_uid"}[$__rate_interval])) / max by (pod, container) (kube_pod_container_resource_requests{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod", resource="memory"}))

# max by(pod, container) should fix overlapping data on container restarts
sum by (pod) (max by(pod, container) (max_over_time(container_memory_working_set_bytes{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod", uid=~"$pod_uid"}[$__rate_interval])) / max by (pod, container) (kube_pod_container_resource_limits{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod", uid=~"$pod_uid", resource="memory"}))
sum(rate(container_network_receive_bytes_total{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod", uid=~"$pod_uid", invalid=$total}[$__rate_interval]))
sum by(pod) (rate(container_network_receive_bytes_total{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod", uid=~"$pod_uid"}[$__rate_interval]))
sum(rate(container_network_transmit_bytes_total{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod", uid=~"$pod_uid", invalid=$total}[$__rate_interval]))
sum by(pod) (rate(container_network_transmit_bytes_total{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod", uid=~"$pod_uid"}[$__rate_interval]))

sum by(pod) (rate(container_fs_reads_bytes_total{container!="", cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod", uid=~"$pod_uid"}[$__rate_interval]) + rate(container_fs_writes_bytes_total{container!="", cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod", uid=~"$pod_uid"}[$__rate_interval]))

options.content:
Read/write from NFS and SMB shares
will not be shown in the storage throughput.

Cadvisor exports data from cgroup io.stats,
which are only calculated for block devices.

targets.expr: sum(ephemeral_storage_pod_usage{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod", invalid=$total})
sum by(pod) (ephemeral_storage_pod_usage{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod"})

list.definition: query_result(last_over_time(namespace_workload_pod:kube_pod_owner:relabel{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", workload=~"$workload"}[$__range]) * on(cluster, namespace, pod) group_left() max by(cluster, namespace, pod) (last_over_time(kube_pod_container_status_ready{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace"}[$__range])) # without kube_pod_container_status_ready the list contains pods that were created but were never able to run)
list.label: pod
list.name: pod

query.query: query_result(last_over_time(namespace_workload_pod:kube_pod_owner:relabel{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", workload=~"$workload"}[$__range]) * on(cluster, namespace, pod) group_left() max by(cluster, namespace, pod) (last_over_time(kube_pod_container_status_ready{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace"}[$__range])) # without kube_pod_container_status_ready the list contains pods that were created but were never able to run)
